alert.note: Alert for Monroe Upper Keys (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Key West (Key West - The Florida Keys)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 10:37PM EDT by NWS Key West
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm and associated outflow boundary will impact portions of Upper Keys in Monroe County through 1115 PM EDT... At 1037 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles south of Ocean Reef, or 9 miles east of Jewfish Creek Bridge, moving west at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jewfish Creek Bridge, Key Largo, Ocean Reef, Route 1/card Sound, Route 1/card Sound Road Split and North Key Largo. This includes US 1 between mile markers 104 and 112. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
